description.narrative: Education sector has the capacity to respond to emergency situations in 8 emergency prone regions, which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Equitable Access To Quality Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Equitable enrolment and retention for boys and girls in 11 regions expanded and increased at pre-primary, primary and lower secondary levels of education by 2015

participating-org.narrative: AFAR REGIONAL DISASTER PREVENTION F SECURITY AND PROGRAMME COORDINATION OFFICE

mailing-address.narrative: UNICEF House (Kazanchis - Opposite UNECA/German House) P.O. Box 1169 Addis Ababa

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
HSS - Risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities emergency relief

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education sector has the capacity to respond to emergency situations in 8 emergency prone regions

description.narrative: Improved capacity of the national Education Cluster is evidenced through the availability by mid 2016 of context specific cluster tools and the effective support provided by dedicated staff from within the federal MoE to regional education structures for drought emergency and refugee situation. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2016

title.narrative: Number of regions implementing EPR plans for education

baseline.value: 5 (Oromia, SNNPR, Somali, Benishangul Gumuz and Gambella))

target.value: 2016:8 (Tigray, Amhara, Oromia, SNNPR, Afar, Somali, Benishangul Gumuz and Gambella)

title.narrative: Availability of cross-sectoral coordination mechanism for delivering education in emergencies

baseline.value: Functional EiE Cluster Coordination available at national level only

target.value: 2016:Functional Emergency Cluster Coordination systems in place in 8 regions and federal MoE
